column4: one; a, an; alone
column9: Represents heaven (天), earth (旦), or the number 1
column10: Although 一 is sometimes said to represent an outstretched finger, the phonetic evidence suggests the fundamental idea is that of its cognate 壹 (unity of contents). 一 may therefore be regarded as an abstract representation of unity, or fullness → *one*.

column4: above, on top, superior; to go up; to attend; previous
column9: One stroke on top of another; compare 下 (below)
column10: A depiction of one line above another, suggesting the idea of rising *above* (contrast 下) → *up*; *upper*; *top* → *rise*; *raise*; *offer*. Other extended meanings include *ascent*; *readiness*; *completion*; *just after*; *go up*; *climb*; *enter*; *end*; *increase*; *improve*; *on*; *beyond*; *first* (half); *emperor*; *raise/bring up* (a matter); *record*; *upward* (bound); *go to the capital*; and *reach*.

column4: below, underneath; inferior; to bring down; next
column9: One stroke under another; compare 上 (above)
column10: The relevant oracle bone form of this character is a depiction of one line below another, suggesting the idea of *under* (contrast 上) → *low*; *lower*; *below*; *down*; *subordinate*; *descend*. Extended meanings from "down" or "below" include *come/go down*; *fall*; *drop*; *hang* (down/from); *hand down*; *younger*; *have diarrhea*; *abort* (a fetus); *step/move back*; *withdraw*; *leave the capital*; *retire* and *surrender*. By further extension are *carry*, *remove* and *clear a table* (← take down from a table); *grate* (← grated shavings that fall below); *give* and *do someone the favor of *(← hand ← hand down); *obtain* (← be handed/given); and *latter half* (← bottom/lower of two halves).

column4: no, not, un-; negative prefix
column9: A bird flying toward the sky 一
column10: A depiction of a bulging, swollen bud (compare 芣). *Not* and *un-* are borrowed meanings (compare 拂 and 非).

column4: east, eastern, eastward
column9: Simplified form of 東, the sun 日 rising behind a tree 木

column4: two, both, pair, couple; ounce
column9: Two people 从 together in a cart

column4: this, that; single; measure word for individuals
column9: A tally 丨 of people 人
column10: The left-hand portion of the character 竹 bamboo, serving as an abbreviated form of 箇 *counter*.

column4: central; center, middle; amidst; to hit (target), to attain; China; Chinese
column9: A line 丨 through the center of a box 口
column10: The relevant oracle bone form of this character shows banners centered on the flagpole run through them → *center/middle* → *inside* → *throughout*; *including*; *the mean*.

column4: to do, to act; to handle, to govern; to be
interrogative particle
marks preceding phrase as modifier of following phrase; it, him her, them; to go to
column9: A foot meaning "to follow"; cursive version of 止
column10: A depiction of a foot/leg in forward motion → *go*; *reach*. *This* and *of* are borrowed meanings.

column4: also, too
column10: A depiction of a long snake (compare 它). *To be* is a borrowed meaning. Conceptually, 也 suggests the idea "stretch."

column4: clear; to finish; particle of completed action
column9: A child swaddled in blanklets; compare 子
column10: A depiction of a long object such as a thread rolled back upon itself → *completion* (← roll up a lengthy object) → *comprehend* (← complete the process of understanding, and comprehend).

column4: affair, matter, business; to serve; accident, incident
column10: The relevant oracle bone form of this character is 又 hand/action indicator + an upright tube for holding slender, inscribed bamboo slats → an official raising a slender tube containing bamboo slats inscribed with records → *matter*; *affair*; *thing* (← matters recorded) → *job*; *work*; *serve*; *attend to* (← carry out official duties). Originally the same character as 史, but 事 and 史 came to bear divergent meanings (compare the same process in 句 and 局).

column4: at, in, on; to, from; alas!
column10: A depiction of an object that stretches before bending into a U-shape. *Here*, *from*, *interrogative particle*, *go*, and *exclamation of lament* are borrowed meanings.

column4: little, few; rather, somewhat
column9: two
column10: As per 此# (line up irregularly) and as per 二 (align) → align objects irregularly, leaving *a bit* of space between them → *a little*; *few*.

column4: relatives, parents; intimate; the hazelnut tree
column9: A tree 木 bearing fruit 立

column4: man, person; people
column9: The legs of a human being
column10: A depiction of a standing *person* reaching toward another, suggesting people in mutable interaction → *human* (being). Compare 仁. In dual-element characters, 人 nearly always appears on the left in the form 亻. In many such characters (價 儗 仰 儆 偃 儀 etc.), 人 suggests human agency, but there are others in which 人 has no semantic function at all. In these cases (伎 優 供 佑 傾 佹 etc.), 人 is used simply to create a derivative character conveying meanings that dropped from the original one.

column4: what? mixed, miscellaneous
column9: A file of ten 十 people 亻
column10: 十# ten + 人 person → *unit/group of ten* soldiers or other persons → *ten*; *a number of objects* → ordinary *utensil*.

column4: modern, current; today, now
column9: A mouth 亼 talking about things
column10: A depiction of one object contained and concealed within another. It is likely the concealing object was originally a mouth (compare 含 and 吟, as well as 甘 and 音). *Now* is a borrowed meaning.

column4: from, by, since, whence, through
column9: One person 人 following another

column4: other, another; he, she, it
column9: An additional, "also" 也  person 亻
column10: A variant form of 佗, and thus the meanings *another* person → *other*; *separate*.

column4: according to; so as to; because of; then
column10: Originally, an abbreviated form# of 台 (plow furrows) + 人 person (→ human agency) → *use* a plow to plow furrows → *with*; *by*; *from* (← create furrows with/by means of a plow).

column4: plural marker for pronouns and some nouns
column9: people

column4: item, matter; component, part; measure word for events
column9: A man 亻 dividing up a cow 牛
column10: 牛 cow + 人# person → person sorting the meat and bones of a dismembered cow carcass (compare 解) → *item*; *case* (← sort through one by one).

column4: to trust, to rely on; to appoint; to bear; duty, office
column9: person
column10: As per 壬# (encompass) + 人 person (→ human agency) → encompass/bear *responsibility* → *duty* → *undertake* (← undertake a duty/responsibility) → *entrust*; *leave* (up to another) (← entrust/leave up to another a duty or responsibility) → *leave to chance*; *endure* (← endure a duty).

column4: companion, colleague; utensils
column9: person

column4: to assemble, to meet; meeting; association, group
column9: People 人 speaking 云

column4: only; but, however, yet, still
column10: As per 旦# (long and flat) + 人 person (→ human agency) → make something long and flat. *But*, *however*, *provided that* and *just* are borrowed meanings.

column4: to reside, to live at, to dwell, to lodge; to stop
column9: A person 亻 who hosts 主; 主 also provides the pronunciation
column10: As per 主# (stationary) + 人 person → person remaining stationary → *dwell*; *reside*; *inhabit*; *live* → *remain put*; *house*; *home*; *address*; *dwelling*.

column4: what, why, where, which, how
column10: Originally, a depiction of a person bearing on the shoulder a load hung from a long pole. The bronzeware and seal inscription forms, though, are 人 + 可# (bend). *What* is a borrowed meaning.

column4: to make; to write, to compose; to act, to perform
column9: A person 亻 making something for the first time 乍; 乍 also provides the pronunciation
column10: As per 乍# (create a pile): → *work*, in the form of making a pile by chopping/cutting → *make*; *craft*; *change into*; *crop*. Compare 似. Here, 人 has no semantic function, being used simply to create a derivative character conveying meanings that dropped from the original one.

column4: you, second person pronoun
column9: Pronoun 尔 for a person 亻
column10: 尓# (= 爾) (adhere) + 人 person → person with close and ongoing relations with oneself → *you*. Compare 儂. Note the variant form 儞.

column4: to safeguard, to protect, to defend, to care for
column9: person
column10: The relevant oracle bone form of this character combines 子# child + 人 person → child protected by being wrapped in a cloth (compare the replacement character 褓) and carried on the back of an adult → *protect*; *protection* → *preserve*; *maintain*; *retain*; *keep*. For the idea of enveloping a child in protection, compare 孚.

column4: to trust, to believe; letter, sign
column10: 人 person + 言# words → person speaking sincerely/truthfully → *truth*; *sincerity*; *belief*; *trust*. *News* is a borrowed meaning.

column4: to wait, to expect; to visit; to greet
column9: person
column10: As per 侯# (lumpy object) + a person (→ human agency) → inspect a lumpy or otherwise conspicuous object → *sign*; *symptom* (← that which attracts attention to a person/object); *scout* (← person who works following signs/clues); *weather* (← signs or indicators of weather). The application to 候 of the Japanese そうろう, a *classical verb ending*, represents a borrowed meaning.

column4: to work, to make; to act
column9: Someone 亻 who causes things to happen 故; 故 also provides the pronuncation

column4: picture, image, figure; to resemble
column9: person
column10: 象# image + 人 person → *image* of a person → *statue*; *resemble*.

column4: son, child
column9: Simplified form of 兒, a picture of a child; compare 人
column10: A variant of 人 person, like 人 suggesting people in mutable interaction → *person*; *human figure*.

column4: first, former, previous
column9: Someone stepping 止 in front of another person 儿
column10: The relevant seal inscription form combines 儿# person + 之 (forward motion) → advance in small increments, the feet in close adherence → *go ahead*; *advance* → *tip*; *previous*; *the late*; *ancestor*; *first of all*; *prior*; *the future*.

column4: to subdue, to restrain, to overcome; used in transliterations
column9: A weapon 十 used to subdue a beast 兄
column10: The relevant oracle bone form of this character shows a helmeted head# + 儿 person → helmeted warrior, stretched to full height (compare 亟). *Overcome* and *conquer* are borrowed meanings.

column4: whole, entire, complete; to preserve
column9: Jade 玉 put away 入 for safe-keeping
column10: An abbreviated form# of 侖 neat assemblage/alignment + 王 (ruler who spans heaven and earth, bringing them into harmony) → ruler who arranges everything *fully*/perfectly → *full*; *perfect*; *all*; *entirely*; *completely*; *utterly* → *in truth*; *indeed*.

column4: fair, equitable; public; duke
column9: To divide 八 what is private 厶
column10: Originally, 八 split right and left + 口# mouth/hole (→ space) → *open* space in which (divided groups of) people gather → *public* → *fair*; *official*; *governmental*.

column4: frontier pass; to close, to shut; relation
his, her, its, their; that
column10: Originally, a depiction of a square or rectangular winnow. The relevant bronzeware inscription form appends 几# desk/table. *That* is a borrowed meaning.

column4: again, twice, re-
column9: Two fish 冉 caught on a line 一
column10: An abbreviated form# of 冓 (symmetrical construction; symmetry) + an additional line (at the top) indicating "another of the same" → *(once) again*; *twice*.

column4: to go out, to send out; stand; produce
column9: A sprout 屮 growing out of a container 凵
column10: The relevant oracle bone form of this character is 屮# grass shoot + 土 earth → grass/bud/sprout protruding from the ground → *protrude*; *emerge*; *appear*; *go/come out* → *proceed*; *depart*; *start/leave*; *set forth*; *begin to*; *origin*; *hold/put out*; *break out*. Extended meanings from these basic ideas include *let out*; *take out*; *present* (for inspection); *turn on*; *give off*; *emit*; *express*; *submit*; *hand/send in*; *send*; *publish*; *issue*; *serve* (food/drinks); *give*; *hang (out)* (a flag); *open* (a business); *pay*; *flow*; *one's turn*; *be on duty*; *come out at*; *reach*; *arrive*; *attend*; *appearance*; *birth*; *be produced*; *be brought up*; *graduate* (from school); and *be in demand*. Also, *pretext* (← present an explanation ← present) and *answer* (a phone) (← appear on the receiving end of a call ← appear). *Soup stock* and *broth* are via the use of だし as an abbreviation of 出し汁 (だしじる). For "protrusion," compare 凸 and 突.

column4: to divide, to allocate; fraction; small unit of time or other quantity
column9: Pieces 八 being further subdivided with a knife 刀
column10: 八# split right and left + 刀 sword/knife → split/*divide* an object, causing it to spread → *branch/split off*; *separate*; *portion*; *share*; *minute*; *counter* (for portions of a whole); *responsibility* (matching one's position) → *distinction*; *know*; *understand* (← know and distinguish through division) → *turn out/prove to be*.

column4: gains, advantage, profit, merit
column9: Harvesting 刂 grain 禾
column10: 禾 here an abbreviated form# of 季 season (→ season when soil is plowed) + 刀 sword/knife → sharp-edged plow → *work* (well/skillfully); *sharp*; *convenience*; *profit*; *advantage*; *be able to*; *be effective* (← sharp, effective implement).

column4: to separate, to distinguish, to classify; to leave; other; do not, must not
column9: To draw boundaries 刂 between classes 另

column4: to go to, to arrive
column9: arrive
column10: As per 刀# (curve) + 至 arrive → arrive via a route that traces an arc → *arrive at*; *reach*.

column4: in front, forward; former, preceding
column10: The relevant seal inscription form of the element# minus 刀 combines an abbreviated form of 船 boat + 止 (leg/foot) → progression of boats or of people on foot. The addition of 刀 sword/knife suggests the idea of cutting/shearing in small increments → *forward progress* in small increments (compare 先 and 踐) → *before*; *in front* (← immediately behind/in front of one). In derivative characters, 前 is often written in the form seen for example in 揃 and 湔.

column4: strength, power; capability, influence
column9: A plow's head representing strength
column10: A depiction of the rippling muscles of a powerful arm → *power*; *energy* → *strength*; *skill*; *ability*; *labor*; *make efforts*.

column4: to add to, to increase, to augment
column9: Supporting a cause with the strength 力 of one's words 口
column10: A variant of 可 (bend/cup a hand about the mouth to amplify the voice in shouting), with *add*, *append* and *increase* being associated meanings (← add a hand atop the mouth to increase the volume of one's voice). Also, *join* (in) and *inflict* (← join in something inflicting damage/injury).

column4: to move, to happen; movement, action
column9: strength

column4: to go away, to leave, to depart
column10: The relevant oracle bone form of this character is 囗 circular enclosure + 大 stand outstretched. However, the phonetic evidence suggests that 大 was originally 屰# reverse, suggesting "reverse course and *withdraw* from a particular place" → *leave*; *go*; *pass* (away from); *disappear* → *last* (October etc.) (← past ← pass). Also, *resign* (a post) and *divorce* (← take leave of). Recall that although the modern forms are distinct, the earliest form of 屰 is 大 written in reverse.

column4: and, also, again, in addition
column9: A right hand, representing a pair; compare 左
column10: A depiction of a person's right arm contracted in surrounding or protecting an object resting on the shoulders → *above*; *beyond* → *again*; *moreover*; *or*.

column4: friend, companion; fraternity
column9: Two hands 又 joined, representing friendship; 又 also provides the pronunciation
column10: The relevant oracle bone form of this character is 又# (right hand/arm) doubled → *work together* → *friend*; *companion* → *friendly*.

column4: to issue, to dispatch, to send out; hair
to receive, to get, to accept; to bear
column9: Something 冖 passed from one hand 爫 to another 又
column10: The relevant oracle bone form of this character is 舟# (curved) boat (here a shape indicator suggesting a large, curved object) + an element combining 爪 claw/hand and 又 hand/action indicator → *receive/accept* a large, curved object → *receptacle*; *catch* (a ball); *popularity* (← receive general acceptance) → *reputation*; *be a success*. Also, *sustain* (damage) (← be on the receiving end of a damaging act) and *support(ing)* (← accept a supporting role), as well as *undergo* and *take an exam* (←be on the receiving end of a trying experience/exam) → *pass an exam*.

column4: only, merely, just
column9: Simple words 八 coming from the mouth 口
column10: 八 here an abbreviated form# of 余 (disperse) + 口 mouth → disperse breath from the mouth in speech. *Only* and *just* are borrowed meanings.

column4: cry, shout; to call, to greet, to hail
column9: mouth
column10: The relevant seal inscription form of 丩 shows it to be twisted threads. 叫 is 口 mouth +丩# for the sound alone to simulate a cry or calling noise (compare 号) → *yell*; *cry out*; *shout*; *scream* → *call*; *name* (in derogatory senses); *appeal* (for); *clamor*.

column4: may, can, -able; possibly
column9: vigorous
column10: The relevant oracle bone form of this character is a representation of a bent hook + 口 mouth → bend/cup a hand about the mouth to amplify the voice in shouting → shout/laugh/sing in a loud voice. *Possible* is an extended meaning (← make it possible to be heard at a distance), with *approve* by further extension (← approve of what has been made possible).

column4: to eat; to drink; to suffer, to endure, to bear
column9: mouth
column10: As per 乞# (rise and hit a blocking element) + 口 mouth → *stammer* (i.e., the breath temporarily and figuratively blocked; compare 詘). Also, *eat* (← stuff one's mouth).

column4: same, similar; together with, alike
column9: Sharing a common 凡 tongue 口
column10: The relevant oracle bone form of this character is 用# (run through) + a hole → run a stick through a board, creating a hole → *same*; *equal* (← board with a stick run through it to the point that the same amount of the stick is on each side of the board).

column4: name; position, rank, title
column9: A name called out 口 to hail someone at night 夕
column10: 夕 here a variant form of the 月 element in 明 (manifest the hidden) and serving as an abbreviated form# of the entire character + 口 mouth → state one's *name* upon being challenged (by a guard), revealing oneself → *repute*; *famous*.

column4: after; behind, rear; descendants
column10: The relevant seal inscription form is the reverse of the elements combined in 司 (peer through a narrow hole), and thus refers to someone kept out of sight → *empress*; *queen* (← female members of the royal/imperial family, whose quarters were secreted deep within a palace; compare 宮).

column4: final interrogative particle
column9: mouth

column4: emphatic final particle
column9: mouth

column4: to hear, to listen; to understand; to obey
column9: Words 口 reaching an ear 斤

column4: to tell, to inform, to announce; to accuse
column9: To speak 口 with the force of an ox 牛
column10: 牛 cow + 口# mouth → cow bending its neck in lowing → *tell*; *inform*; *announce*; *signal* (← communicate in "speech").

column4: wool; interrogative or emphatic final particle
column9: mouth

column4: harmony, peace; calm, peaceful
column9: mouth
column10: 禾 here an abbreviated form# of 龢 (harmony; calm; peace) + 口 mouth → *harmony*; *calm*; *peace* (produced by words/song) → *soften*; *moderate*; *lessen*; *tone down*; *ease* → *die down*. *Japan* is a borrowed meaning (see 倭 for explanation).

column4: oh? really? is that so?
column9: mouth
column10: 口 mouth + 我# for the sound alone to simulate an exclamation → *sing/recite*.

column4: which? where? how?
column9: mouth

column4: ah, exclamatory particle
column9: mouth

column4: to love; to enjoy, to be happy; joyful, glad
column9: Singing 口 and beating drums 壴
column10: As per 壴# as described in 鼓 (round drum set on a stand) + 口 mouth → joyful voices at a feast with musical accompaniment → *joy*; *gladness*; *like*; *be fond of*; *pleasure*; *happiness* → *good*; *desirable*; *congratulations*.

column4: interjection indicating agreement or appreciation
column9: mouth

column4: quiet, silent
column9: mouth

column4: to return, to turn around; a time
column9: Originally, a spiral signifying return
column10: A depiction of one object rotating within another → *rotate*; *revolve*; *spin*; *turn/go around* → *pass around*; *spread* (of a fire); (of medicine/alcohol) *take effect*; *number of times*; *encircle*; *curve*; *return*; *detour*; *cycle*. Extended meanings include *refer to* (a specialist) and *transfer* (← pass around), as well as *sumo wrestler's belt* (← encircling object). 回 may be regarded as a variant of the cognate 冎/咼 (bone circulating in its joint).

column4: cause, reason; by; because
column10: The relevant oracle bone form of this character shows bedding upon which a person lies/adheres (that is, over which the person is superimposed) → *depend*; *cause*; *be connected with* (← superimposition) → *be based on*; *be due to*; *therefore*; *consequently*.

column4: country, nation, state; national
column9: Treasure 玉 within a country's borders 囗

column4: at, in, on; to exist; used to indicate the present progressive tense
column9: earth
column10: The relevant seal inscription form is 才# cut off + 土 earth → pile earth to cut off the flow of a river. *Be*, *exist*, *location*, *stay*, *be alive*, and *in* are extended meanings (← be fixed firmly in one place; compare 居, 有, and 存) → *country(side)* (← permanence of rural abodes).

column4: earth, ground, soil; land, region; structural particle used before a verb
column9: earth
column10: As per 也# (stretch) + 土 earth → a stretch of *land/earth* → *territory*; *field*; *environment*; *base*.

column4: field, open space; market, square; stage
column9: earth

column4: scholar, gentleman; soldier
column10: A depiction of an erect object formed by small composite materials (compare 且). *Man* and *retainer* are associated meanings (← person standing erect), with *samurai* by extension.

column4: out, outside, external; foreign; in addition
column9: Night-time 夕 divinations 卜; the supernatural, the foreign
column10: 夕 here a variant form# of 月 (crescent) moon + 卜 divination → cast horoscopes on the basis of the invisible *outside* portion of the moon (compare 朏) → *other* → *some/any other place*; *somebody else*; *others*; *besides*. The sense of "the part other than the portion scooped out" leads to extended meanings such as *take off*; *be/come off*; *remove*; *undo*; *take leave*; *evade*; *edge* and *outskirts* → *miss* (the mark); *be wrong*; *failure* → *violate*.

column4: much, many, multi-; more than, over
column9: Two nights 夕, suggesting many
column10: The relevant oracle bone form of this character is a doubling of 肉 flesh → *much* meat aligned in a tall, neat pile → *many*.

column4: big, great, vast, high, deep
column9: A man 人 with outstretched arms
column10: A depiction of a person standing greatly outstretched, reducing the distance between oneself and others → *big*; *large*; *great*; *full*; *spacious* → *extremely*; *too*; *excellent*; *general*.

column4: sky, heaven; god, celestial
column9: The heavens 一 above a man 大
column10: 大 stand outstretched + a line above the head indicating the horizon (compare 旦) → top of the head (of a person standing outstretched and uniting heaven and earth) → *the sky/heavens* → *the natural world*; *the supreme god*; *destiny*; *emperor*; *heaven*. Compare 王. As it is in 旦, the line was the phonosemantic element in 天.

column4: very, too much; big; extreme
column9: A giant 大 with a normal-sized man 丶 for scale
column10: A variant of 大# great that acquired the meanings *be/become thick*, *extremely*, *too* and *fat*, as well as *calm*.

column4: head; chief, boss; first, top
column9: high

column4: woman, girl; female
column9: A woman turned to the side
column10: A depiction of a supple *woman*.

column4: she, her
column9: A woman 女 beside you 也

column4: good, excellent, fine; proper, suitable; well
column9: A woman 女 with a son 子
column10: 子# child + 女 woman → woman clasping a child → *like*; *love* → *desirable*; *favorable*; *fondness*; *pleasing*; *fine*; *taste*; *choice*; *preference*.

column4: as, as if, like, such as, supposing
column9: A wife 女 following her husband's words 口
column10: As per 女# (supple) + 口 mouth → take a supple (= pliant) attitude toward another person's suggestion. *Equal* and *as (if)* are borrowed meanings → *how/what* (to do).

column4: mother, mama
column9: woman

column4: to begin, to start; beginning
column9: woman
column10: As per 台# (heavy downward pressure) + 女 woman → fetus hanging heavily in the womb → *begin*; *start* (← pregnancy as the origin of life).

column4: son, child; seed, egg; fruit; small thing
column9: A child in a wrap, with outstretched arms but bundled legs
column10: 子 is the single remaining form of two distinct oracle bone depictions of a small child. One shows a small child, while the second shows a child with rapidly growing hair → *child*; *son*; *boy*; *person*; *suffix appended to small objects*. Conceptually, a child was understood as one of a figurative pile of offspring. *Rat* (as the first sign of the Chinese zodiac), *north*, and *11 P.M. to 1 A.M.* are borrowed meanings. The Old Chinese readings of the two glyphs featured different vowels.

column4: learning, knowledge, science; to study, to go to school; -ology
column9: A building 冖 where children 子 study; ⺍ provides the pronunciation

column4: baby, child; children
column9: child
column10: As per 亥# (stretched taut) + 子 child → *baby* suckling at a taut, milk-filled breast → *babyish*; *immature*.

column4: it; other
column10: A depiction of a long *snake* (compare 也) → stretch; be elongated. *Other* is a borrowed meaning.

column4: peaceful, tranquil, quiet
column9: A woman 女 safe in a house 宀
column10: 宀# roof/building + 女 woman → woman resting/at ease indoors → *be at ease/peace* → *cheap*; *inexpensive* (← cheap enough to be purchased with ease).

column4: to complete, to finish, to settle; whole
column9: roof
column10: As per 元# (round) + 宀 roof/building → be surrounded completely → *complete*; *fulfill*; *end*.

column4: to decide, to fix, to settle; to order; definite, fixed, sure
column9: A person 疋 settling under a roof 宀
column10: Variant# of 正 (straight) + 宀 roof/building → stand straight upright (fixed in place) in a building → *fix in place*; *settle*; *settle down*; *set* (a date); *determine*; *decide* (← fixity) → *rule*; *regulation*; *law*; *fate*; *destiny* (← fixed rules/destiny). Also, *sure* and *certain* (← correctness/certainty of a decision taken, or of a rule).

column4: real, true; honest, sincere
house, home, residence; family
column9: roof
column10: 宀 roof/building + 豕 pig/boar, here a variant form of 亥# (pig/boar stretched taut for slaughter) → pigs/boars confined in a hut or shed and awaiting slaughter → *house*/*household* → *home*; *family*; *shop*; *store*; *business* → *dealer*; *seller*; *specialist* (← tradesman operating a particular business).

column4: correct, right; facing, opposed
column9: A pair 又 of hands 寸

column4: small, tiny, insignificant
column9: Dividing 八 by a line 亅
column10: A depiction of small and curled, whittled shavings → *small*; *little*; *infant*; *a little bit*.

column4: you; that, those; final particle
just, simply; to go to; to approach, near
column9: specialty
column10: As per 尤# (contracted hand) + 京 metropolis → contract the arm in summoning people to a metropolis → *settle*; *take up* → *take/get a job*; *take instruction*; *embark* (upon) (← take up) → *appoint*; *provide service for* → *arrange*. Also, *seat* (a guest) (← settle).

column4: labor, work; laborer, worker
column9: A spade or other workman's tool
column10: A depiction of a long hollow tube used as a tool both to pierce and to connect → *work*; *construct* (← work/construct using connecting pipes/tubes) → *artisan*; *specialist*; *skillful*.

column4: self, oneself; personal, private; 6th heavenly stem
column9: A loom woven with thread
column10: A depiction of a primitive loom consisting of two sticks, between which threads are stretched or raised. In derivative characters, 己 suggests "arise." *Oneself*, *sixth in a series* and *sixth calendar sign* are borrowed meanings.

column4: already; finished; to stop; then, afterwards
column10: A depiction of a forked stick used as a plow. *Stop*, *quit*, *just*, *already* and *to a great degree* are borrowed meanings. Distinguish 已 from 己 and 巳.

column4: belt, strap; band, ribbon; area, zone; to carry, to raise, to wear
column9: A belt, creasing one's robe above 卅 but not below 巾

column4: to help, to assist; to support, to defend; party; gang
column9: A nation's 邦 flag 巾; 邦 also provides the pronunciation

column4: common, general, normal; always, frequently, regularly
column9: cloth
column10: As per 尚# (rise → raise) + 巾 cloth → raise a long skirt. *Normal*, *ordinary*, *continual* and *unending* are borrowed meanings.

column4: arid, dry; to oppose; to offend; to invade
column9: A club or axe
column10: A depiction of a forked stick or *thick bar*, one functioning as a *shield* and employed by being *thrust* or pressed against a combatant in *defense*. *Dry*, *ebb*, *draw/drain off* and *empty* (a glass) are borrowed meanings.

column4: year; anniversary; a person's age
column9: A man 干 carrying grain, representing the annual harvest
column10: The relevant bronzeware inscription form is 禾 grain/rice + 千# (advance through luxuriant vegetation) → advance through crops in harvesting → *year*; *age* (← harvest as the end of a long agricultural cycle; compare 歳).

column4: should, must; to respond, to handle; to deal with, to cope
to open; to start, to initiate, to begin
column9: Simplified form of 開; hands 廾 lifting the latch 一 of a door

column4: appropriate, timely; to act, to serve; the sound of bells
very, quite, much
column9: step
column10: As per 艮# (adhere) + 彳 movement → adhere to one's position obstinately → *obstinacy* → *be irrationally committed to a bad cause* → *quite* (← great degree ← excessive degree).

column4: to obtain, to get, to acquire; suitable, proper; ready
column9: A hand 寸 grabbing a shell 旦
column10: The relevant seal inscription form of 㝵# combines a variant form of 戎 (seize) + 寸 hand/action indicator → take goods in hand; acquire. 得 adds 彳 movement/action indicator → take hold of goods → *acquire*; *gain* → *(take) advantage*; *be able to*; *hit the mark*; *work well*.

column4: heart; mind; soul
column9: A heart
column10: A depiction of a slender object encompassed in the *heart* of another object → *mind*; *breast*; *center*; *core*; *thought*; *consideration*; *meaning*; *taste*; *spirit*; *sincerity*; *emotion*; *feelings*.

column4: speedy, rapid, quick; soon
column9: A decisive 夬 will 忄; 夬 also provides the pronunciation
column10: As per 夬# (scoop out) + 心 heart/emotions → *pleasant*; *comfortable* (← heart with all the unpleasantness scooped out of it) → *refreshing*; *enjoyable*. Compare 欠/缺.

column4: what? why? how?
column9: heart

column4: to think, to ponder, to consider; final particle
column9: Weighing something with your mind 囟 (altered) and heart 心
column10: The relevant oracle bone form of this character shows that the top element was originally not 田 field but a depiction of a profusion of fine bones in fontanels, open spaces in an infant's skull over which the skull bones eventually fuse; compare 兒. 思 adds 心 heart/emotions → finely detailed thoughts → *think*; *consider*; *believe* → *be sunk in thought*. Compare 慮.

column4: emotion, feeling, sentiment
column9: heart
column10: As per 青# (clean/pure) + 心 heart/emotions → pure emotion, in the form of *compassion*, *sympathy*, *pity* or *charity* → *truth*; *circumstances* (← true feelings expressing a situation exactly as it is).

column4: to believe, to wish for; to consider, to plan, to think
column9: mind
column10: 相# mutual + 心 heart/emotions → thoughts one harbors with respect to an object → *thought*; *idea*.

column4: thought, idea, opinion; desire, wish; meaning, intention
column9: heart
column10: As per 音# (contained) + 心 heart/emotions → keep contained in the heart (compare 念) → (deep) *thought*; *mind*; *signification*.

column4: to affect, to move, to touch; to perceive, to sense
column9: Two hearts 心 beating together 咸
column10: 咸# (shut) + 心 heart/emotions → *emotion/feeling* that shuts off sensation (= moves/affects one to the point of muteness or immobility).

column4: to accomplish; to become; to complete, to finish; to succeed
column10: Originally, 丁# (nail) + a pounding tool → pound nails (straight) into an object → *make* (← object/structure containing nails); *do* (← pound nails as one form of doing work) → *become*; *complete*; *achieve*; *established*; *existing*. In the present form, the pounding tool resembles 戊 battle-ax.

column4: I, me, my; our, us
column9: A hand 扌 holding a weapon 戈
column10: The relevant oracle bone form of this character is a variant of 戈 spear/halberd, indicating a weapon/knife with a serrated blade (i.e., a blade the teeth of which are in alignment).

column4: place, location; "that which", a particle introducing a passive clause
column9: An axe 斤 swung at a door 户
column10: 戸# door + 斤 ax → use a bladed implement to shave wood into the shape of a door. *Place* is a borrowed meaning → *partition*; *about*; *in case*; *local*; *counter for places*.

column4: hand
column9: A hand with the fingers splayed
column10: A depiction of a *hand* showing the five fingers in a curved, gripping position. Extended meanings include *arm*; *paw*; *foreleg*; *a handle*; *helper*; *a means*; *technique*; (in board games) *a move*; *a type*; *a direction*; and *handwriting*.

column4: ability, talent, gift; just, only
column9: A sprout growing in the ground, representing a budding talent
column10: A depiction of rocks piled to cut off/dam a river → *stop/cut off* → *a little*; *for the first time*. *Genius* and *ability* are borrowed meanings, as is (number of) *years old*.

column4: to attack, to beat, to hit, to strike
column9: hand
column10: As per 丁# (strike a nail) + 手 hand/action indicator → *hit/strike*.

column4: to search for, to look for, to find; change (as in money)
column9: To go searching with a spear 戈 in hand 扌

column4: to grasp, to hold; to guard, to take; handle
column9: hand
column10: As per 巴# (spread) + 手 hand → spread the hands and *take/grasp* an object (compare 捕).

column4: to bring, to grasp, to hold, to take
column9: hand
column10: As per 合 (press/fit together) + 手 hand/action indicator → *grab* a slave → *catch* → *arrest*. Originally, the character was written 拏, with 奴 in place of 合, suggesting the use of the hand in strenuous activity. Some dictionaries continue to give 拏 as standard, with 拿 noted as a variant form.

column4: to connect, to join; to receive, to meet, to answer the phone
column9: hand
column10: As per 妾# (close proximity) + 手 hand/action indicator → *touch*; *contact*; *join*; *connect*; *associate*; *sexual intercourse*.

column4: to release, to liberate, to free
column9: let go
column10: As per 方# (spread) + 攵 (strike) → strike an object, causing pieces to spread/*scatter* in all directions → *release*; *set free* → *reach*; *fire* (a gun); *expel*; *leave up to*.

column4: this, thus, such; emphatic particle; used in transliterations
column10: 斤 ax + 其# (winnow) → *split* apart a winnow. *This*, *such* and *namely* are borrowed meanings.

column4: new, recent, fresh, modern
column9: A freshly chopped 斤 tree 亲
column10: The left-hand element# is an abbreviated form of one combining 辛 needle/cutting tool and 木 tree/wood → thornbush (the sharp, needle-like thorns in close proximity). 新 adds 斤 ax → create firewood by chopping a thornbush/tree with a sharp ax. *New* is an extended meaning (← freshly hewn tree/wood) → *recently/lately*.

column4: square, rectangle; side; region; flag
column10: A depiction of rafts/boats moored side by side → *side*; *line up* → *direction* (← spread in all directions ← spread right and left) → *compare* (← side); *skill*; *method* (← direction); *square* (← spread in equal amounts). *Person* is via locational usage as seen in 樣.

column4: no, not; lacking, -less
column10: A variant form of 亡 non-existent → *negation*. Distinguish 无 from both 旡 and from 兂.

column4: time, season; period, era, age
column9: day

column4: bright, clear; to explain, to understand, to shed light
column9: The light of the sun 日 and moon 月
column10: Originally, 月 moon + 向# (ventilation hole) → *bright* moonlight streaming through an *open* window, and manifesting the hidden → *brightness*; *light*. Extended meanings from the idea of the light of dawn (signaling the end of one day and the start of the next) include *spend/pass* (the night); *be visible*; *the next/following* (day/week/year); *begin*; *end*; and *dawn*. *Disclose* and *confide* are extended senses of "open" (open up to), as are *clarity*; *evident* and *obvious*. *Be conversant with* is via the idea of illumination, here with respect to a particular subject matter. The reading ミン refers to the Ming Dynasty (1368-1644).

column4: to be; indeed, right, yes; okay
column9: To speak 日 directly 疋
column10: The relevant bronzeware inscription form is 止# (stand straight) + a spoon/ladle → straight spoon/ladle → *correct*; *just*; *right* (← abstract applications of straightness/uprightness).

column4: night, evening; late
column9: Avoiding 免 the sun 日; 免 also provides the pronunciation

column4: more, further; to shift, to alternate; to modify
column10: As per 丙# (spread) + 攴 action indicator → stretch a rope (compare the derivative character 綆, a rope attached to a well bucket). The meanings *replace* and *change* likely owe to the drawing of fresh well water to replace that which has been used, or dried up. (Still) *more* and *further(more)* are borrowed meanings, as are *grow late* and *stay up late*.

column4: most, extremely, exceedingly; superlative
column9: To take place 取 under the sun 日 (that is, everywhere)
column10: Originally, 冃 as described in 冒 (cover) + 取# (take hold of) → grasp a container's cover and take a pinch of its (precious) contents → *extreme* (← extremely little/few ← small amount) → *most* (← amount approaching an extreme).

column4: to have, to own, to possess; to exist
column10: The relevant seal inscription form is as per 又# (right hand/arm) + 肉 flesh → extend the right hand/arm in shouldering a slab of meat → *have* (← hold) → *be*; *exist* (← have being ← have form ← object in a fixed point of space; compare 居, 在, and 存).

column4: friend, pal, acquaintance
column9: Two people 月 walking together
column10: A depiction of a long string of shells threaded together and spread in alignment (compare 貫, also seashells pierced and strung together). *Friend* and *companion* are extended meanings (← figurative string of friends/companions).

column4: to expect, to hope, to look forward to
column9: A king 王 gazing at the moon 月; 亡 provides the pronunciation
column10: The relevant oracle bone form of this character is 臣 (staring subject/retainer) + 人 person ← gaze at the moon. In the bronzeware inscription style, which adds 月 moon, the 臣 + 人 components have morphed into a single element. A seal inscription form adds 亡# (obscure) → *wish*; *hope*; *desire* (← hopes/desires with only obscure chances of realization).

column4: root, origin, source; basis
column9: A tree 木 with its roots highlighted
column10: 木 tree/wood + a horizontal line# (compare that in 旦) indicating the *base*/*root* of the trunk → *origin*; *originally*; *true*; *one's own*; *capital*; *counter* (for cylindrical objects) → *book* (← counter for scrolls ← counter for cylindrical objects).

column4: desk; machine; moment, opportunity
column9: A table 几 made of wood 木; 几 also provides the pronunciation
column10: 几# desk/table + 木 tree/wood (for emphasis/clarification) → (wooden) *desk*.

column4: to kill, to murder, to slaughter; to hurt
column9: To kill 乂 someone and bury them in a coffin 木

column4: to arrive, to come, to return; in the future, later on
column9: A wheat plant that has not yet borne fruit; compare 來

column4: fruit, nut; result
column9: Fruit 田 growing on a tree 木
column10: A depiction of a tree with round *fruit* hanging from a long branch → *result* (← fruit of effort); *fill*; *fulfill*; (← fully ripe) → *carry out*; *accomplish* (← fulfill) → *limit*; *end*; *come to an end*; *die* (← final result) → *as expected* (← end up as expected); *actually* (← turn out actually to be); *be at a loss* (← come to an end of resources).

column4: form, pattern, shape, style
column9: tree

column4: order, sequence; second, next; one after the other
column9: A person 欠 yawning multiple times 冫
column10: The relevant bronzeware inscription form is 二# (align) + 欠 bent, open-mouthed figure → bend/kneel in aligning small objects → *order*; *sequence* (← place things in precise order) → *next*; *follow*; *after that*; *counter* (for times/matters). In dual-element characters 次 is sometimes written in the form seen for example in 恣.

column4: happy, glad, joyful
straight, right, proper, correct, just, true
column9: A foot 止 stopping in the right place 一
column10: 止# (stand straight) + a line → straight line → *punctual*; *right*; *correct*; *straighten*; *proper* (← abstract applications of the idea of straightness/uprightness; compare 是) → *surely*; *certainly*.

column4: dead; death; impassable, inflexible
column9: A person kneeling 匕 before a corpse 歹
column10: The relevant bronzeware inscription form combines an abbreviated form# of 比 line up (people) + 歹 severed bone/death → a line of corpses → *death* → *die*; *execute*.

column4: to compare, liken; comparison; than
column9: Two spoons 匕 side-by-side; 匕 also provides the pronunciation
column10: The relevant bronzeware inscription form shows two persons, one immediately behind the other, suggesting "line up people" → *line up*; *objects of a similar kind* → *compare* (← compare two objects by lining them up); *rate*. For the idea of lining up, see also 竝 and 方.

column4: not, none, gone; to bury; to sink, to drown
column9: water
column10: The relevant seal inscription form shows that the right-hand element# (traditionally written as per the right-hand element of 歿) was originally swirling water + a hand → body dimly visible in the water in which it is submerged (compare 沈). 水 water was appended for emphasis/clarification → *sink* → *die*.

column4: law, rule, statute; method, way; French
column9: The course 去 followed by a stream 氵
column10: The relevant bronzeware inscription form is 水 water + an element# combining 去 (withdraw) and 廌 imaginary beast with a single horn → cause a creature to withdraw to an island → *law* (← enjoy freedom of action within the framework of the law ← enjoy freedom of movement within the confines of an island; compare 憲 律 笵 and 埒) → *fixed way of doing*; *rule*; *Buddhist truth*; *follow*; *model*. The 廌 element eventually dropped.

column4: to exist, to live, to survive; living, working
column9: water
column10: As per 舌# (chisel-like implement in motion) + 水 water → break a container with a chisel-like implement, creating an active flow of the liquid contents → *activity* → *life*.

column4: dot, point, speck
column9: fire

column4: certainly; naturally; suddenly
column9: fire
column10: Effectively a variant form of 難 (grill over a fire), with the distinction that in 難 it is 隹 a bird being grilled while in 然 it is 犬 a dog/beast → *burn*. *Thus*, *that's right*, *but*, *however*, and *as it is* are borrowed meanings.

column4: to love, to like, to be fond of; love, affection
column9: To bring a friend 友 into one's house 冖

column4: father, papa
column9: father
column10: 父 father + 巴# for the sound alone to simulate a term of address directed toward a *father*. Compare the conjunction between the sound "pa" and the meaning "father" in many Indo-European languages.

column4: special, unique, distinguished
column9: ox
column10: As per 寺# (stand straight) + 牛 cow → particularly tall bull, surpassing others → *special*; *excellent*; *outstanding*. For the idea of being excellent in the sense of surpassing, compare 卓.

column4: to appear, to manifest; current, now
column9: To see 见 jade 王; 见 also provides the pronunciation

column4: science, reason, logic; to manage
column9: king
column10: As per 里# (long strip) + 玉 jewel → veins or streaks in a piece of jade → *logic*; *reason* (← lines/threads of a reasoning process ← vein; streak) → *principle*; *natural science*.

column4: life, lifetime; birth; growth
column9: A shoot 屮 growing in the soil 土
column10: The relevant seal inscription form is an abbreviated form# of 艸 grass/plant + 土 earth → fresh, slender grass shoots → *birth*; *life* → *new*; *fresh*; *sprout*; *raw*; *alive*; *by nature*; *youth*; *unripe*; *pure*; *bear fruit*; *spare a life*; *bring back to life*; *make use of*; *make a living*; *be/remain valid*; *arrange flowers/plants*; *grow*; *undiluted*.

column4: to use, to employ, to apply; use
column10: The relevant oracle bone form of this character depicts a stick being run through a rectangular board, piercing a hole → *use*; *action* → *have a need* → *go to the toilet* (← have a need to relieve oneself).

column4: electricity; electric; lightning
column9: Simplified form of 電; lightning 申 from a storm cloud 雨

column4: white; clear, pure, unblemished; bright
column9: A burning candle; the rays of the sun
column10: A depiction of an acorn, a large number of which would be scattered over the ground. The meaning *white* is by association with the color of acorn meat. For "large number," compare 百.

column4: aim, goal; of; possessive particle; -self suffix
column10: As per 勺# (rise and become evident) + 白 white (→ color that stands out) → conspicuous *target*; *mark*; *objective* → *obvious*; *hit*; *-like*.

column4: straight, vertical; candid, direct, frank
column9: To look someone in the eye 目
column10: The relevant bronzeware inscription form is 目 eye + an element# combining a straight line and a dot representing a pupil → eye looking straight ahead → *direct*; *immediately*; *frankness* → *fix/repair*; *correct*; *make/get well* (← straighten out).

column4: mutual, reciprocal; equal; each other
column9: To stare 目 at a tree 木, meaning to observe
column10: 目 here an abbreviated form# of 省 (observe) + 木 tree/wood → eyes focused on an object (establishing a *mutual* relation between observer and observed) → *together*; *watch*; *assist*; *assistant*; *shape*; *appearance* → (grammatical) *voice*; *emphatic verbal prefix*. Also, *minister* (← one who assists a ruler).

column4: to look, to see; to examine, to scrutinize
column9: Shielding one's eyes 目 with a hand 手 to look to the distance
column10: 手 hand + 目, here an abbreviated form# of 見 fix sight upon → hand affixed above the eye to shade it and improve focus → *see*; *watch*.

column4: real, actual, true, genuine
column9: A straight 直 (that is, level) table 几

column4: to make a move, to take action
column10: Originally the same character as 著. When 著 came to refer to literary works, 着, a variant of 著 in popular usage, took over the meanings it presently expresses. As with 著, *adhere* and *meet with* are via the "pile" concept behind 者. The many extended meanings include *wear*, *put on* and *dress* (← clothing attached to the body), *be seated/take up a position* and *arrive/reach* (a destination) → *reach (to)*; *counter* (for clothes, or to enumerate the order of finishers in a race ← wear clothing; arrive); *cover* and *pin responsibility on*.

column4: to know, to perceive, to comprehend
column9: mouth
column10: 矢# arrow in flight + 口 mouth → knowledge allowing one to *speak to the essence of a matter* with the directness of an arrow in flight → *know*; *understand*; *realize*; *discover/notice* (the truth); *distinguish* (the truth) (← have the knowledge and insight to speak unerringly) → *intelligence* → *inform*; *notify*; *report*; *news*. Also, *omen* (← have advance knowledge of), *experience* and *feel* (← understand through experience and feeling) → *concern oneself*; *acquaintance* (← person one knows).

column4: certain, sure; definite, exact; real, true
column9: stone
column10: As per 角# (hard, curved object) + 石 stone → barren, rocky earth (compare 埆). For the meanings *certain* and *true*, compare 確.

column4: rare beast; strange; elegant
column9: An animal standing straight; 亠 is the head
column10: A variant of 廌 odd beast → odd, horned beast → *rare beast*; *strange*.

column4: race, kind, breed; seed; to plant
column9: grain

column4: sequence, number; grade, degree; particle prefacing an ordinal
column9: Bamboo strips ⺮ arrayed in sequence; 弟 provides the pronunciation
column10: An abbreviated form# of 弟 (vertical alignment) + 竹 bamboo → neatly stacked pieces of bamboo (compare the bamboo counting sticks in 算) → *ordinal number*; *prefix*; *grade*; *degree* (← stacking).

column4: rank, grade; same, equal; to wait
column9: Bamboo strips ⺮ laid before a court 寺
column10: As per 寺# (stand straight) + 竹 bamboo → bamboo stalks/pieces of *equal* height, arranged vertically → *equivalent*; *grade*; *rank*; *et cetera* (← listing of equivalent/similar items).

column4: the classics; to experience, to undergo
column9: thread

column4: knot, tie; to connect, to join
column9: thread

column4: to give, to lend; for, by
column9: thread

column4: beautiful, pretty; pleasing
column9: A person 大 wearing an elegant crown 羊
column10: The present form combines 大 person standing outstretched and 羊 sheep (originally, goat), but neither of these elements can supply the Old Chinese pronunciation of the character. The phonetically close term conveyed by 㒼 (described in 満) suggests that 美, like 㒼, involved the notion "cover the body completely with an animal skin that has its head still attached." The exact provenance of the meanings *beautiful* and *good* is uncertain, as is the identity of the element replaced by 大.

column4: old, aged; experienced
column9: A person bent over with long hair 匕 and a crutch; compare 耂
column10: A depiction of an aged person with a bent back (compare 久) → *old*; *elderly*.

column4: that which; they who; those who
column10: A depiction of brushwood/firewood piled on a stove. However, 者 was borrowed for use as a demonstrative pronoun, later evolving in meaning to the sense of "the one who does this" → *person*. The present form of 者 and certain derivative characters of 者 eliminate a diagonal stroke above 日, such as is retained for example in 堵, 屠 or 奢.

column4: and, and then, and yet; but
column10: A depiction of a soft and droopy beard. Compare 冉. *Then*, *you*, *and*, *moreover*, and *but* are all borrowed meanings.

column4: can, may; capable, full of energy
column9: A bear's head 厶, body ⺼, and claws 匕
column10: A depiction of a bear, a supple and powerful creature → *ability*; *skill*; *able* (← power/ability to accomplish something ← powerful) → *endure* (← power/ability to hold out) → *Noh* (← skill).

column4: self; private, personal; from
column9: A nose; in China, people refer to themselves by pointing to their noses
column10: A depiction of a nose. Conceptually, the character suggests slender streams of breath passing through the nostrils (compare 四) of a stumpy nose. *Self* is an extended meaning (← point toward one's nose to indicate self) → *by/for oneself*; *originally*; *from*.

column4: to go, to walk, to move; professional
column9: To take small steps 亍 with one's feet 彳
column10: A depiction of straight and crossing roads extending into the distance → *go*; *movement*; *procession*; *road* → *line* (of people) → *conduct*; *do*; *perform* (← carry out an action).

column4: bedding; a passive particle meaning "by"
column9: cloth
column10: As per 皮# (align) + 衣 clothing → align clothing (or bedclothes/bedding) over the body → *cover*; *be covered* → *reach*; *suffer*; *incur* (← be figuratively covered by unpleasant matters) → *passive auxiliary verb* (← be acted upon ← suffer).

column4: west, western, westward
column9: A bird settling into its nest, representing sunset; compare 東
column10: A depiction of a nest in which chicks are neatly aligned. *West* is either a borrowed or an extended meaning; in the latter case the idea might be that of the reddish sun aligned with the horizon at sunset. (For "reddish," compare 茜.) By further extension is *the Pure Land*, Buddhism having entered China from lands west.

column4: essential, necessary; to ask for; to coerce; to demand
column9: A woman 女 with hands on her waist 覀
column10: The relevant bronzeware inscription form is 女 woman + an element combining a pair of hands and a backbone → compress a woman's waist, creating curvaceous hips → waist; hips → *main point*; *vital* (← hips as the pivot point of the body) → *brief*; *sum up*; *in short*. Also, *demand* (← demand that which is vital to one) → *want*; *need*; *require*.

column4: to see, to observe, to meet, to appear
column9: Simplified form of 見; a man 儿 with the eye 目 emphasized

column4: conscious; to nap, to sleep; to wake up
column9: see

column4: to explain; to loosen; to unfasten, to untie
column9: To cut 刀 the horns 角 off of an ox 牛; 角 also provides the pronunciation
column10: 角# horn + an element combining 刀 sword/knife and 牛 cow → *remove* cattle horns in butchering → *dismember*; *break*; *release*; *unravel*; *disentangle*; *untie*; *loosen*; *solve*; *melt* → *understand*; *explain* → *dispel* (← dispel doubts and obtain understanding) → *cancel*. *Comb* is by extension from "disentangle."

column4: to guard, to watch; alarm, alert
column9: speech
column10: As per 敬# (stiff; upright) + 言 words → cause others to go stiff/upright by admonishing or warning them → *warn* → *regulate*; *alarm*; *careful*.

column4: to calculate, to count; to plan, to reckon; plot, scheme
column9: speech

column9: speech

column9: A private 己 note 讠; 己 also provides the pronunciation

column9: Words 讠 of blame 斥; 斥 also provides the pronunciation

column4: talk, speech; language, dialect
column9: A spoken 讠 tongue 舌; 舌 also provides the pronunciation

column4: should, ought to, must
column9: speech

column4: to speak, to say; to scold, to upbraid
column9: speech

column9: speech

column4: to walk, to run, to flee
column9: Someone 土 stepping with their foot 止
column10: The relevant bronzeware inscription form combines an abbreviated form# of 足 leg/foot + 夭 (slender, limber figure of a running youth) → *run* → *first product of the season*; *herald of a beginning* (← run ahead).

column4: to begin, to initiate; to rise, to stand up
column9: walk
column10: 己# arise + 走 run/action indicator → arise and *cause* to *occur* → *arise/awaken*; *generate*; *start*; *begin*; *establish* → *originate in*; *stay awake*.

column4: heel; to accompany, to follow; with
column9: foot
column10: As per 艮# (adhere) + 足 leg/foot → *heel* (← body part that adheres to the ground) → *follow*; *accompany* (← follow on the heels of another).

column4: body, torso; person; pregnancy
column9: A pregnant woman
column10: A depiction of a *pregnant* woman, the fetus adhering within her womb → *body*; *core/center*; *content of an object*.

column4: cart, vehicle; to move in a cart
column9: Simplified form of 車, a cart with two wheels, seen from above

column4: pass; to go across, to pass through
column9: walk

column4: also, besides; still, yet; to return
column9: Not 不 moving 辶

column4: this, these; such; here
to advance, to make progress; to come in, to enter
column9: walk

column4: method, way; path, road
column9: walk
column10: 首# (run through) + 辵 movement → *path*, *road* or *street* running through a settlement → *way*; *highway*.

column4: that, that one, those
column10: The left-hand element# is a variant of 冄 as described in 冉 (supple). 那 adds 邑 (village/settlement), but the original form of the character had a different element than 邑. The identity of this original form and the original meaning of the character are now obscure, although the meaning was likely to have been connected with the concept "supple" as this concept is active in derivative characters such as 娜, 挪 and 梛. *How*, *which*, *what*, and *that* are all borrowed meanings. 那 is used in transliterations of terms such as 刹那 (Sanskrit: ksana), an instant.

column4: department, ministry; division, unit; part, section
column9: place
column10: As per 咅# (spread) + 邑 village/settlement → spread over *part* of a settlement → *section*; *group*. Also, (via "a part"), *counter* (for books/papers) and *radical/classifier* for a Han/Chinese character.

column4: all, each, entirely, whole; metropolis; capital
column9: city
column10: As per 者# (pile) + 邑 village/settlement → *metropolis* or *capital* on a hill (= pile of earth) → *gather*; *assemble*; *rule* (many people); *all*; *administrative division*.

column4: unit of distance equal to 0.5km; village; lane
column9: Unit of measure for farm 田 land 土
column10: 田 field + 土# pile of earth → long strip of piled earth/land with alternating cultivated and noncultivated sectors → *village*; *the country(side)*; *one's hometown*. Also a *unit of length*, approximately three kilometers.

column4: heavy, weighty; to double, to repeat
column9: A burden carried for a thousand 千 miles 里
column10: The relevant seal inscription form is 東# (run through) + a person standing on the ground → the *weight* of a person thrusting down heavily on the earth, as though to run through it → *heavy*; *pile up*; *be piled upon*. Extended meanings include *fold*, *ply*, *occur simultaneously*, *do repeatedly* and *place weight on/attach importance to* → *value highly*; *importance*; *important*. Also, *depressing* and *serious* (← heaviness/weightiness).

column4: money, currency, coins
column9: money

column4: error, mistake; incorrect, wrong
column9: Gold 钅 that once was 昔 but is lost

column4: long, lasting; to excel in
column9: Simplified form of 長; an old man with long hair and a cane

column4: to ask about, to inquire after
column9: mouth

column4: between, among; midpoint; space, place, locality
column9: The sun 日 shining through a doorway 门

column4: hard, difficult, arduous; unable
column9: A hand 又 trying to grasp at a bird 隹

column4: to need, to require; must
column9: Rain 雨 needed for crops to grow
column10: As per 而# (soft and droopy) + 雨 rain/natural phenomena → be drenched and become soft and droopy. *Demand* and *require* are borrowed meanings.

column4: not, negative, non-; to oppose
column9: Two bird's wings opposed; two people back-to-back
column10: A depiction of curved wings that spread in alignment to right and left → *not*; *non-*; *in-*; *un* (← brush off a request in objecting/refusing → *object*; *refuse*) → *fault*; *mistake*; *wrong*; *incorrect* (← negativity). Compare 不, as well as 拂.

column4: face; surface, side; plane, dimension
column9: A person's face
column10: The relevant seal inscription form combines 首 neck/head + a line# adhering to and nearly surrounding it, suggesting a *mask* adhering closely to and partially obscuring the *face* → *surface*; *aspect* → *turn (a face) to*; *look away*; *side*; *direction* → *counter* (for flat objects).

column4: forehead; headline, title; theme
column9: head

column4: horse; surname
column9: Simplified form of 馬, a horse galloping to the left

column4: tall, lofty; high, elevated
column9: A tall palace
column10: A depiction of one of a pair of tall, curving gate towers → *tall*; *high* → *expensive* (← high price). Compare 冓.
